name: set
chn: vt. 为…设置背景于; 创立; vt. 落 (下)
example_en: The director set the play in 19th century London.
example_cn: 导演将这部戏剧的背景设定在19世纪的伦敦。
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语'settan'，意为放置或固定。联想记忆：想象一个电影导演在布置场景，将背景设置在特定的时间和地点。图像记忆：想象一个电影场景，导演正在指挥布置一个19世纪的伦敦街道。

image_prompt.main_image: A movie director on a set, pointing and giving instructions to the crew, with a backdrop of a 19th-century London street scene.
image_prompt.example_image: A theater stage set up to resemble a 19th-century London street, with actors in period costumes and props like old-fashioned street lamps and cobblestone roads.

collocations: set up (建立); set free (释放); set in stone (板上钉钉); set the table (摆桌子); set a goal (设定目标); set the scene (布置场景)
